TUTORIAL.name: Damage
TUTORIAL.TALK: Watch out Chef! Getting hurt saps your energy. Eating most noms will give you some energy back.

TUTORIAL.name: Energy
TUTORIAL.TALK: Sugar-filled Noms only give a burst of fast burn energy. There are some Noms that give you long lasting slow-release energy that lasts longer.

TUTORIAL.name: Heart
TUTORIAL.TALK: Hello Chef! If you run out of energy or fall too far, you'll lose a healthy heart section. Run out of hearts and it's game over.

TUTORIAL.name: Groups
TUTORIAL.TALK: Chef, hear my wisdom. Eat a mix of Noms for a healthy life! Find the five food groups RED,GREEN,YELLOW,PURPLE and BLUE - eat one food from each and I'll give you an extra heart.

TUTORIAL.name: Vitality
TUTORIAL.TALK: Many Noms contain vital elements. Consume the right Noms to complete your vitality shield for enlightened protection until the end of the level.

TUTORIAL.name: Gut Size
TUTORIAL.TALK: Your gut can only hold two Noms at once. It's best to wait for one to digest before you eating something else!

TUTORIAL.name: Heart Dam
TUTORIAL.TALK: Beware Chef, fatty Noms can have lots of useful energy but some may clog up your heart and kill it dead.

TUTORIAL.name: Fat
TUTORIAL.TALK: Fatty Noms can super-size you for a short time! Use your extra bulk to crush and block enemies, weigh down platforms and fight strong winds.

TUTORIAL.name: Thin
TUTORIAL.TALK: Super-exercising makes you skinny and light until you eat again! You can squeeze through tiny gaps and land softly but your body is weak and vulnerable.

TUTORIAL.name: Gas
TUTORIAL.TALK: Hold your nose! Some Noms produce excess wind. With FART JET power, hold down [X] to boost yourself up.

TUTORIAL.name: Strength
TUTORIAL.TALK: High protein Noms produce muscle and give you the POWER PUNCH. Press [X] to bash a clear path.

TUTORIAL.name: Speed
TUTORIAL.TALK: Super sweet Noms trigger the SUGAR RUSH power-up, which let you RUN and JUMP faster with fast-burn energy. Too much of a good thing can be hard to stomach though.

TUTORIAL.name: Extend
TUTORIAL.TALK: Chef, if your power-ups are not lasting long enough, eat a carb-rich Nom to extend their effect.

TUTORIAL.name: Longer
TUTORIAL.TALK: Some power-ups can last longer when combined with similar power-up Noms but you risk some nasty side effects...

TUTORIAL.name: Bomb
TUTORIAL.TALK: Eat a FART Nom and a STRENGTH Nom. Press [X] to make a fart bomb! Pick it up and throw it around! Fart bombs explode when they hit something.

TUTORIAL.name: Rocket
TUTORIAL.TALK: Eating a FART Nom with a SPEED Nom gives you rocket farts! Press [X] to build power then use [LEFT] and [RIGHT] to set direction, and release to rocket away!

TUTORIAL.name: Turbo
TUTORIAL.TALK: Release some aggression with TURBO PUNCH. Press the [X] key whilst running to wreak havoc.

TUTORIAL.name: Too-fat
TUTORIAL.TALK: Oh dear, it's the Incredible Bulk! Use [X] to transfer the fat to your heart before you explode.

TUTORIAL.name: Bloat
TUTORIAL.TALK: Wind overload! You've literally ballooned. Use the arrow keys to float around.

TUTORIAL.name: Nausea
TUTORIAL.TALK: Eating lots of sugary Noms will make you sick. Hold down [X] to see what we mean...Not pleasant!

TUTORIAL.name: Rage
TUTORIAL.TALK: Double-muscle meat-head equals RAGE MODE! Get it out of your system by braking through barriers.

TUTORIAL.name: Throw
TUTORIAL.TALK: When carrying an item, drop it by pressing [X]. When running you will throw them instead.

TUTORIAL.name: Temple
TUTORIAL.TALK: Welcome to the Temple of Nom! Discover the secrets of the Noms you have eaten. Check your achievements and expand your knowledge. Collect enough Noms and you may open secret new areas...

TUTORIAL.name: Swim
TUTORIAL.TALK: Dive in, the water is lovely! Use the arrow keys to swim along.

CONVERSATION.TALK: Welcome young Chef. Beyond lies Nature World, the first quest on your journey!
You must find the 10 lost pages torn from the sacred Book of Nom to rescue Nom Nation.
Each page will unlock a new quest in your journey through Fire, Ice, Sugar and Factory Worlds until a final showdown with Jabber The Gut himself.
If you need to take a break or switch off the music, press [SPACE] to get to the pause menu. Good luck, I hope you're feeling hungry! Nom nom nom...
